ENTRY.refkeywords: multi multiple read rmf instrument response responses load readrmf readfile

DESC.PARA: The load_multi_rmfs command loads multiple RMFs from FITS files and assigns them response ids. More than one RMF may be associated with a single dataset.

LIST.ITEM: id - the id of the dataset to use; if not given, uses the default dataset id (id=1 by default, see "ahelp get_default_id")
filename - a list of the files (with path) which contain the RMF data
resp_id - a list containing a response id for each file loaded

DESC.PARA: The RMF files source1.rmf and source2.rmf are loaded as responses 1 and 2 for the default dataset.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
